actionable_tasks.title: Implement Circuit Breaker Pattern for Provider Failover
actionable_tasks.description: Add a circuit breaker mechanism to the backend provider switching logic to automatically failover when a provider is unhealthy. This improves reliability and resilience for multi-provider LLM support.
implementation_steps: Design a simple circuit breaker class or utility (open/closed/half-open states, error threshold, reset timeout).
Integrate circuit breaker checks into provider request logic in src/api/providers.js.
Log state transitions and trigger failover to alternate providers when threshold is exceeded.
Add basic unit tests for circuit breaker behavior.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Request Correlation IDs for End-to-End Tracing
actionable_tasks.description: Attach a unique correlation ID to each incoming request and propagate it through backend pipelines for improved observability and debugging.
implementation_steps: Generate a UUID for each incoming request in middleware.
Attach correlation ID to request context and logs.
Ensure correlation ID is included in responses and error logs for traceability.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Automated Test Coverage for Provider Switching
actionable_tasks.description: Increase the number of automated tests for provider switching and telemetry endpoints to ensure reliability and catch regressions.
implementation_steps: Review existing tests for provider switching and telemetry.
Add new test cases for edge scenarios (failover, latency spikes, error handling).
Run tests and verify coverage improvements.

actionable_tasks.title: Frontend: Complete Spotify Authentication Interface
actionable_tasks.description: Finish the Spotify OAuth login and token management UI to enable users to connect their Spotify accounts for music discovery features.
implementation_steps: Implement OAuth flow UI (login button, redirect, token storage).
Handle success/error states and display appropriate messages.
Test with a real Spotify account to verify end-to-end flow.

actionable_tasks.title: Add MongoDB Compound Indexes for Analytics Queries
actionable_tasks.description: Create compound indexes on MongoDB collections used for analytics to optimize query performance and reduce latency.
implementation_steps: Identify high-frequency analytics queries and relevant fields.
Define compound indexes in migration scripts.
Apply indexes and benchmark query performance improvements.
